author: alexf72
title: New Birthday Card set
review:
Picked this set up at my local Lego Store today for 4.99. It is a nice idea, it comes as a kind of birthday card (about the same size as well) with some space to write a name and a small note. (however, the set is not designed to be sent as mail) The card is the same size and form as 5004931-1

It includes a mini-fig with interchangeable head (boy/girl) and little carnival build with a stud shooter. The card folds out to double the original size, is fully printed with a carnival theme and balloons and can be used as a backdrop and target board to shoot at with the stud shooter (there are some pre-cut holes as targets). It ads really nicely to any fairground or carousel set.
